title: 54 - Why DeFi is the Future | Mark Cuban
description:
Mark Cuban needs no introduction, but the entrepreneur and Shark Tank host has an impressive depth of knowledge of the crypto space, and he has a particular ability to break complicated subjects into simple, digestible ideas.

Listen as we talk DeFi, NFTs, Ethereum, and the future of finance with Mark Cuban!
